import './register.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { useAddUserMutation } from '../../features/userApi' import {toast} from 'react-toastify' const Register = ()=>{ let isLoading = false const [addUser] = useAddUserMutation() const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName:'', lastName:'', email:'', password:'', }) const resetInput = ()=>{ setUser({ firstName:'', lastName:'', email:'', password:'' }) } const submitHandel = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() isLoading = true addUser(user).then((response)=>{ if(response.data.type === "success"){ toast.success(`${response.data.msg}`) resetInput() // isLoading = false } }) } return (
Registration
submitHandel(e)}>
setUser({...user,firstName:e.target.value}) } />
setUser({...user,lastName:e.target.value})} />
setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Register
